verses.roman:
jagat tārite prabhu tomāra avatāra
mora nivedana eka karaha aṅgīkāra

synonyms: jagat tārite—to deliver the whole world; prabhu—my Lord; tomāra—Your; avatāra—incarnation; mora—my; nivedana—petition; eka—one; karaha aṅgīkāra—please accept.
translation: Vāsudeva Datta told Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "My dear Lord, You incarnate just to deliver all conditioned souls. I have now one petition, which I wish You would accept.
